title: Hilary Duff shares adorable video watching 'The Lizzie McGuire Movie' with her kids
text:
Hilary Duff celebrated her 32nd birthday on Saturday with a fun bash with her family and friends.

Her fiancé Matthew Koma shared several snaps and videos from the day on his Instagram story.

In one video, Duff watched her 2003 film, "The Lizzie McGuire Movie," with her children, Luca, 7, and 11-month-old Banks.

"Family viewing of Lizzie McGuire movie," he captioned the video.

Hilary Duff watching The Lizzie McGuire Movie with her boyfriend and 2 kids 😭 pic.twitter.com/7J6Kc3fqWw — Lizzie McGuire (@ImLizzieM) September 29, 2019

Koma also shared an adoring post for Duff in advance of her birthday.

"May this be your greatest year yet with more smiles and laughs than you know what to do with," he wrote. "I’m the luckiest to get to wake up to you every day and I can’t wait to do it for another 200 birthdays, given the support of science to make that possible. I love you the most."

Duff's reply to the sentimental post showed her appreciation.

"I wish you could see the smile I have right now," she commented on his post. "Making me feel all special. Everyday."

The actress also shared a photo posing with a monkey on her big day, which was another surprise from Koma.

📸 @HilaryDuff on Instagram Story: I asked to meet a monkey for my 32 birthday and of course my @MatthewKoma made my dream come true. pic.twitter.com/U9J2NYP3g1 — Hilary Duff News (@HilaryNews) September 29, 2019

"I asked to meet a monkey for my 32 birthday and of course my @matthewkoma made my dream come true," she captioned the photo of her laughing.
description: Hilary Duff celebrated her 32nd birthday on Saturday with a fun bash with her family and friends.
